item.description:
BUY TICKETS ONLINE NOW

Ritmo Masacote will be featured this March in one of Cambridge / Boston's most favorite musical venue gems. Regattabar received the "Best of Boston 2011" award for jazz and blues, and features a spectacular dining venue, right in Harvard Square.


YES!!! They will be opening up a dancefloor for us!!!

Come dress up, eat, drink, and be merry with Ritmo Masacote this March. Tickets are only $20 now online.

"Ritmo Masacote is a 13-piece Cuban Salsa Orchestra Powerhouse comprised of some of Berklee’s most talented professors/alums/students and NY & Boston’s finest musicians. Many of the members are in their early twenties, but don't let them fool you. This young, charismatic cast produces commanding presentations full of life, spirit, and contagious energy. The orchestra was created with the purpose to bridge the growing divide between the music and dance genres by making listeners want to move and dancers want to play.

Although originally founded in 2006 as a Latin Jazz band, Ritmo Masacote has now become known as THE Cuban Salsa band in Boston since it's crossover into the Cuban market in 2009, gaining tremendous popularity as far as Italy, Japan, Peru, and Colombia.

The ensemble’s music can be found on motion pictures, global instructional DVDs, and can be heard on major radio stations and satellite radio both nationally and internationally. Often coupled on stage with the Masacote Entertainment dancers, an internationally touring dance troupe, the ensemble is making waves in building communities through music and dance worldwide."

How to find us

We will try to have a reserved table or area and so if you want to arrive later I will be there.

BUY TICKETS ONLINE NOW

Questions/Concerns

 

 

Please do not hesitate to send me your questions/comments/concerns. I am happy to answer all matter of meetup or salsa related questions as best I can and if I can't I will find someone who can.

Look forward to meeting all of you! Salsa party over here!

There will be an after party at the Havana Club with SYC afterwards, see you there!

Lonzell
item.how_to_find_us: We will try to have a reserved table or area, so if you want to arrive later I will be there.

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: Regattabar Features Ritmo Masacote
